SETTINGS.SuppressWarningH: Never show the warning that deduping may impact your entities and/or folders
FORM.Criteria.Advanced.Help:
Enter a dot-notated property path for the entity.
(Eg. for an Actor you might enter data.data.attributes.hp.value)
FORM.NoDuplicates: No duplicates found based on criteria
DEDUPE_WARNING.Title: Dedupe Warning
DEDUPE_WARNING.Body: By clicking 'Yes' you accept that the deduping process will make changes to your entities and/or folders and any issues arising from this is your responsibility.
WORDS.Name: Name
